attributes.action: refuse to grant Michael Martin, the current Speaker of the House of Commons, any form of title in the House of Lords due to his woeful behaviour in relation to the handling of MPs' expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has abused his position as Speaker of the House of Commons by using public money to block the publication of MPs' expenses and failing to take steps to change the system governing MPs' expenses until forced to do so by public opinion, leading to his forced resignation following a vote of no confidence.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
